short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn X Engagment into a video game ⚡️

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use keyboard shortcuts & AI to 10x your X/Twitter engagement flow.

Keyboard shortcuts:

J - Move down a tweet
K - Move up a tweet
cmd/ctrl+I - Insert reply suggestion
cmd/ctrl+Enter - Post reply
